== Malaysian LoCo Team Mentoring ==

The idea of this project is to help and guide junior member in our team to begin their contribution in LoCo Team and prepare them to get official ubuntu membership. This is related to our LoCo Team's long term plan to increase number of official Ubuntu member from our LoCo
